name: 60 Counts Curtain
description:
Open the curtains, and count to 60.

Control is only click screen.

  • In short, it's Statues game. (だるまさんが転んだ The Daruma Fell Over)
  • Never move the curtain when a ghost is in front of you!
  • When the zombie runs towards you, it will force the curtain to close.
  • If you hear the zombie's voice, close the curtains immediately!
    • But be careful, if you close the curtain too many times, the ghost will come closer!
